title: swap user name
body:
my user got ban so i want to create a new user and give him the name of my first user 
how can i do that 
sorry my english bad
thx for the help

replies.body: As long as you're the creator of both accounts, we should be able to get that name swap done in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
